Uses of Class
com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware.BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder

  • Packages that use BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware
    The com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware package provides interfaces for managing the virtual hardware configuration and state of a virtual machine.

    • Uses of BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder in com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware

      Methods in com.vmware.vcenter.vm.hardware that return BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setDelay(java.lang.Long delay)
      Delay in milliseconds before beginning the firmware boot process when the virtual machine is powered on.
      BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setEfiLegacyBoot(java.lang.Boolean efiLegacyBoot)
      Flag indicating whether to use EFI legacy boot mode.
      BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setEnterSetupMode(java.lang.Boolean enterSetupMode)
      Flag indicating whether the firmware boot process should automatically enter setup mode the next time the virtual machine boots.
      BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setNetworkProtocol(BootTypes.NetworkProtocol networkProtocol)
      Protocol to use when attempting to boot the virtual machine over the network.
      BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setRetry(java.lang.Boolean retry)
      Flag indicating whether the virtual machine should automatically retry the boot process after a failure.
      BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setRetryDelay(java.lang.Long retryDelay)
      Delay in milliseconds before retrying the boot process after a failure; applicable only when BootTypes.Info.getRetry() is true.
      BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder BootTypes.CreateSpec.Builder.setType(BootTypes.Type type)
      Firmware type to be used by the virtual machine.
